channel.title: [Delta]NPC's Invisible[Help]

item.title: [Delta]NPC's Invisible[Help]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Now I know theres been many…many questions on this, but I just can’t find an answer for it
Here’s my npc thats invisible

if(i == 3785) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.aString65 = "Gluttonous behemoth"; class5.anInt61 = 613; class5.aByteArray89 = "This guy is scary!".getBytes(); class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; class5.anIntArray94[0] = 56920; }

I’m not too sure its because my model is “56920” and its not loading, so if thats the problem how do I expand the number of models I can have…where and how do I do that.

If thats not the solution then what is? I’m sure many people like to have the answer to this quesiton

Thanks
